import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react' import '../DetailComponent/Detail.css' import { TemaVerisi } from '../../App' import backIcon from './arrow_back.png' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios' function Detail({ deger, deger2 }) { let { countriesName } = useParams(); const [countriesData, setCountriesData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/${countriesName}`) .then(res => { setCountriesData(res.data) }) }, [countriesName]) console.log(countriesData) return (
{countriesData && countriesData.map((item, id) => { return ( ) })}
